title: Video: Kodak To Graph – Glaciaa
content:
Having just finished a dream tour with Braids and Hundred Waters, Gainesville’s beat-maestro Kodak To Graph has compiled this rather gorgeous footage from the road, featuring new track Glaciaa.

Taking in expansive, mountainous scenery and racing through picturesque, roadside shops, all against the backdrop of Mikey Maleki’s intricately beautiful compositions. Check out the video below, and grab a free download from Soundcloud.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
